  Source   Edit

Statically typed ast for subset of HTML

Originally implemented to generate graphviz html-like labels.

Imports

../core/all, ../core/code_errors, ../types/hprimitives, ../types/colorstring, xml_ast

Types

HtmlElem = ref object
  elements*: seq[HtmlElem]
  attrs*: StringTableRef
  class*: seq[string]
  case kind*: HtmlElemKind
  of hekTable:
      border*: int
      bgcolor*: Color
      height*: int
      width*: int

  of hekText:
      textProps*: set[HtmlTextProp]
      textColor* {.requiresinit.}: Color
      textColorBg* {.requiresinit.}: Color
      textStr*: string
      textPre*: bool

  of hekCell:
      cellColor*: Color
      cellBgColor*: Color
      cellSize*: ArrSize
      dotPort*: int

  of hekOther:
      tagname*: string

  of hekRaw:
      rawstr*: RawHtml

  else:
      nil
  Source   Edit 
HtmlElemKind = enum
  hekTable, hekRow, hekCell, hekElemList, hekImage, hekOther, hekText, hekRaw
  Source   Edit 
HtmlTextProp = enum
  htpNone, htpBold, htpUnderline, htpItalic
  Source   Edit 
RawHtml = distinct string
  Source   Edit 
Xml = XmlNode
  Source   Edit
